posts.post_content: Hello-  I'm wanting to trade my N321 Buckley for an interesting 19th century player or team cabinet photo.  I would also be interested in anything George/Harry Wright.  I also have several other 19th century items that could be available in trade for the right item.  Please email me with any questions/offers at jpcw1999 at yahoo.com.  Thanks, Jeremy
Nice card, Jeremy.  I'm surprised there are no takers?
Thanks, Gary.  There's been some interest, but trades are always a little more tricky than an outright sale.  Jeremy
I'm now putting the card up for sale... asking SOLD.  Please email me at jpcw1999@yahoo with any questions/offers.  Thanks, Jeremy
